_header: But one thing mistress grieves me full sore
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 291.
_description: Humfrey Newton, A love letter to his mistress — eight quatrains with refrain, ‘…my hert wold berst’

BodLatMisC66.First Lines:
Bot on thynge mastres greues me ful sorethat makes my hert wel
                    neȝ to barst…
BodLatMisC66.Last Lines:
…I dout not bot it shall be so be synt Iamewhen ye are reulid
                    by youre & may do as y list
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Poems of Humphrey Newton, Esquire, 1466-1536.” 
             PMLA
         65 (1950): 249-81: 271-2.
